fields.summary: [VZ_CHR2fB][ARCADYAN][WEBUI] After creating a static lease for a device from the web UI  the device does not show up on the DHCP Connections page .

status.description: SW with updated config was released

fields.Action:
Access to the DHCP Page and define a reserved static IP address for a DHCP LAN client.
	Eg:name    IP address             MAC address
	     PC1         192.168.1.145        00:05:1B:05:8D:60
fields.Expected Result: The entry is well added to the static ip table.

fields.Action: Unplug and Plug the concerned PC (with the reserved MAC address) and check the obtained IP address.
fields.Expected Result: The PC obtains the expected address Eg: 192.168.1.145

fields.description:
The test aims to check the ability to set static IP addresses.
[Precondition]

First boot after a reset.
Lan PC1 connected.
fields.summary: [DHCP-SERVER] DHCP Server - Static IP, Step 1

security.description: Only SoftAtHome people can access the issue
security.name: SAH
